meaning: to seek (ie: advice アドバイスを)
to give, to bestow (ie: advice アドバイスを)
to move, transfer (in general) (cf. 引っ越す：to move (residence))
invitation, solicitation (する：to invite, solicit (eg: to join a club))
very hard, with utmost effort, for dear life (一生懸命)
first-rate, foremost (noun with gen. case particle の)
a masterless samurai; student who studies for a year after failing college entrance exam
decrease in number of children due to low birth rate
point (mark, score, grade, point; also of an argument)
just one more step (ie: just a bit more improvement)
